Take Action on the Healthy Youth Act.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Take Action Now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Young people in Illinois deserve inclusive and affirming comprehensive sexual health education.

The Healthy Youth Act provides public school students in grades 6-12 a toolbox of knowledge and skills needed to support responsible and informed decisions about their health. It also sets standards for sexual health education in grades 5 and below. By updating the instruction of comprehensive sexual health education, this bill gives young people critical information that is culturally appropriate and unbiased.

Tell your state legislators to support the Healthy Youth Act.

This bill expands sexual health education standards in Illinois to include and affirm the parts of our communities that have been stigmatized or entirely excluded, including LBGTQIA and pregnant or parenting youth.

Tell your state legislators to support providing students with a complete toolbox of knowledge that they can use to make healthy decisions throughout their lifetime.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of Illinois
